title: Dead Rising 4 E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Greg and Tim breakdown the Dead Rising 4 E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy

transcript_chunks.text: E3 2016 is happening Kinda Funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long subscribe now at youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames to not miss a thing what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys this is Greg Miller welcome back to Kinda Funny E3 2016 Kinda Funny React Spectacular right now we're talking about Dead Rising 4 Frank West is back he back baby now is this this is the direct this is the trailer straight not even from the conference this is straight up so I can actually look at it this time rather than be wanting to murder the director I understand but I don't need to see the audience I wanted to see this I'm a big Dead Rising fan I don't know if you know this about I do know this about you didn't I didn't play much of Dead Rising 3 did a bunch of previews on it got it home started it I was like this isn't Dead Rising this is what I want but this is what I want Frank is back there he is Frank West here we go back in a mall killing things at Christmas that's what I

home started it I was like this isn't Dead Rising this is what I want but this is what I want Frank is back there he is Frank West here we go back in a mall killing things at Christmas that's what I like to see crazy he's got what now Lucille oh yeah yeah don't come on now don't be crossing the universe is here but you see what we love uh this going off super excited that it's not uh Xbox exclusive mhm you know what I mean they said it's you know they put it out there and they didn't make a big deal about it so clearly coming to PlayStation 4 so there we go but nice things my main concern of course it looks great and it's running really well I hope it runs this well in final form because obviously that's a huge problem I love this outfit this Exo Suit looks pretty rad uh hope there's still some Mega Man in there how do you feel about the whole Christmas theme why not that gets you going yeah I don't mind yeah I mean it's like mistletoe it's there it's them embracing what Dead Rising

some Mega Man in there how do you feel about the whole Christmas theme why not that gets you going yeah I don't mind yeah I mean it's like mistletoe it's there it's them embracing what Dead Rising is and that's just being completely goofball and having all the different weapons they're selfies I appreciate that as always I hope the timed events don't come back I was never a fan of that of like oh man I'm missing this missing that encourages replayability I know jumping back in having a different game but I never have time for that I want one good playthrough being Frank West killing a bunch of things having a bunch of cool ass weapons and things to kill but I don't need to get out there and be nuts about it I appreciate this this holiday that is right around the corner for I mean obviously you're talking about the weapons and stuff we're seeing a ton of them here we saw candy cane shooter and stuff the Christmas theme I think they're going to go too far with it but that's the point that's

talking about the weapons and stuff we're seeing a ton of them here we saw candy cane shooter and stuff the Christmas theme I think they're going to go too far with it but that's the point that's yeah yeah that's pretty cool it all comes back to Bad Burger so I think we're okay wor about it bees yeah so yeah anything else out about this no super excited that it's back super excited it's Frank West I think the weapons look cool it's running really well now you are almost out of battery I'm not running too well um no I'm I'm very very excited for it it looks like a return to the form of what I expect Dead Rising to be and because it was the the weird Town thing we had going before in Dead Rising 3 wasn't what I wanted out of it but seeing a mall seeing him run around it looks like again a part of the town is going to be closed down but this some dinosaur going on Triceratops come on who you kidding this looks great there we go Dead Rising 4 ladies and gentlemen are you hyped for this

part of the town is going to be closed down but this some dinosaur going on Triceratops come on who you kidding this looks great there we go Dead Rising 4 ladies and gentlemen are you hyped for this game let us know in the comments below and stay tuned to KindaFunny.com all week long E3 2016 we are.
